title: Save the Goblin Sazza
content:
Save the Goblin Sazza Type Quest Act 1 Location Druid Grove Reward Assassin's Touch

Save the Goblin Sazza

Save the Goblin Sazza is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Save the Goblin Sazza can be acquired during ACT 1. Completing Save the Goblin Sazza will progress the story forward.

Save the Goblin Sazza Objectives

Free Sazza Escort Sazza out of Grove Reach the Goblin camp

Save the Goblin Sazza Walkthrough

Stop the Tiefling Arka from killing Sazza at the makeshift prison of Druid Grove. (Persuasi
